sql: CREATE TABLE 'blockingHistory' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, type VARCHAR(10), phone VARCHAR(20), name VARCHAR(100), calledTimestamp DATETIME, uploaded DATETIME) ;

CREATE TABLE 'blockList' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, type VARCHAR(10), phone VARCHAR(20), name VARCHAR(100), calledTimestamp DATETIME, transactionKey VARCHAR(36), unblocked SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1) ;

CREATE TABLE 'complaints' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, filedTimestamp DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, type VARCHAR(10), phone VARCHAR(20), callerName VARCHAR(100), textMessage VARCHAR(200), calledTimeStamp DATETIME, status VARCHAR(20), canceled SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, filerName VARCHAR(100), noCallerInfo SMALLINT, noSaleCharity SMALLINT, noCostPolicy SMALLINT, threatening SMALLINT, nightHours SMALLINT, abandoned SMALLINT, ignoredDNC SMALLINT, recordedMsg SMALLINT, note TEXT, callType VARCHAR(50), relationship SMALLINT, falseInfo SMALLINT, failedToIdentity SMALLINT, deceptive SMALLINT, threatenedArrest SMALLINT, threatenedSuit SMALLINT, informedOther SMALLINT, obsceneLanguage SMALLINT, threatenedViolence SMALLINT, callsRepeatedly SMALLINT, ignoredCeaseNotice SMALLINT, transactionKey VARCHAR(50), offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1) ;
CREATE TABLE 'blockingOptions' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, optionType VARCHAR(20) CONSTRAINT optionType UNIQUE, checked SMALLINT, message VARCHAR(160), offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1);
CREATE TABLE 'DeviceInfo' (property VARCHAR(30) constraint property unique, value VARCHAR(50)) ;

CREATE TABLE 'xtify' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, tranId VARCHAR(50), notifyId VARCHAR(10), keyFrom VARCHAR(50), messageType TEXT, messageTitle TEXT, message TEXT, processed SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, receivedDts DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, processedDts DATETIME, batchId VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT '');
CREATE TABLE 'syncStatus' (transType VARCHAR(10) CONSTRAINT transType UNIQUE, tcn VARCHAR(50)) ;
CREATE TABLE 'nonSupportedDevices' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, noAppSupportMake VARCHAR(20), noAppSupportModel VARCHAR(20), noDNDSupportMake VARCHAR(20), noDNDSupportModel VARCHAR(20)) ;
CREATE TABLE 'groupBlocking' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number VARCHAR(10) CONSTRAINT number UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(100), unblocked SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1) ;

CREATE TABLE 'smartBlocking' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, number VARCHAR(10) CONSTRAINT number UNIQUE, name VARCHAR(100), numUserBlcks INTEGER, unblocked SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, offline SMALLINT DEFAULT 1) ;
CREATE TABLE 'appSettings' (settingName VARCHAR(250) CONSTRAINT settingName UNIQUE, settingValue TEXT) ;
INSERT INTO 'nonSupportedDevices' (noAppSupportMake, noAppSupportModel, noDNDSupportMake, noDNDSupportModel) VALUES ('kyocera corporation', 'zio', 'kyocera corporation', 'zio');
INSERT INTO 'nonSupportedDevices' (noAppSupportMake, noAppSupportModel) VALUES ('zte', 'x500');
INSERT INTO 'nonSupportedDevices' (noDNDSupportMake, noDNDSupportModel) VALUES ('lge', 'lg-lw690');
INSERT INTO 'nonSupportedDevices' (noDNDSupportMake, noDNDSupportModel) VALUES ('lge', 'lg-ms690');
INSERT INTO 'blockingOptions' (optionType, checked, offline) VALUES ('text', 1, 0);
INSERT INTO 'blockingOptions' (optionType, checked, offline) VALUES ('unknown', 0, 0) ;
INSERT INTO 'blockingOptions' (optionType, checked, offline) VALUES ('dnd', 0, 0) ;
INSERT INTO 'blockingOptions' (optionType, checked, offline) VALUES ('service', 1, 0) ;
INSERT INTO 'blockingOptions' (optionType, checked, offline) VALUES ('group', 0, 0) ;
INSERT INTO 'blockingOptions' (optionType, checked, offline) VALUES ('smart', 0, 0) ;
